sentences.en: a course of study that will broaden your horizons
sentences.cn: 一门能开阔眼界的课程

sentences.en: A dark cloud loomed up over the horizon.
sentences.cn: 一片乌云突然出现在天际.

sentences.en: A few scattered lights shone on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 地平线上闪耀着几处星星点点的灯光。

sentences.en: A ship hove in sight just above the distant horizon.
sentences.cn: 一条轮船恰好出现在天海相接处.

sentences.en: At the horizon the land mass becomes a continuous pale neutral grey.
sentences.cn: 陆地在地平线处变成了一片浅灰。

sentences.en: Graham sat aft , looking steadily out to the horizon.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆坐在船尾, 凝望着地平线.

sentences.en: He descried an island far away on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 他看到遥远的地平线上有个岛屿.

sentences.en: He scanned the horizon for any sign of land.
sentences.cn: 他仔细眺望地平线，找寻陆地的踪影。

sentences.en: In the distance, the dot of a boat appeared on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 远处小黑点般的一条小船出现在地平线上。

sentences.en: Johnson's smashing victory in 1964 changed the political horizon substantially.
sentences.cn: 1964年约翰逊的大获成功给政界带来了翻天覆地的变化。

sentences.en: She stared dreamily out of the small window at the blue horizon.
sentences.cn: 她出神地看着小窗子外面的蓝色地平线。

sentences.en: Soon they were only dots above the hard line of the horizon.
sentences.cn: 很快他们就成了地平线上的几个小点了。
船长向地平线扫视了一下.

sentences.en: The first signs of the dawn appear on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 黎明的曙光出现在地平线上.

sentences.en: The lamp tower soars above the horizon.
The shipwrecked sailor scanned the horizon anxiously every morning.
sentences.cn: 这位遭船难的水手每天早晨焦虑地注视着海天相接之处.

sentences.en: trouble could be on the horizon.
Ugly clouds gathered on the horizon.

sentences.cn: 我们能看见地平线上有一艘船。
